TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Eviscerate
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your Eviscerate ability by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Remorseless Attacks
TalentsTiers.Description: After killing an opponent that yields experience or honor, gives you a [@value]% increased critical strike chance on your next Sinister Strike, Hemorrhage, Backstab, Mutilate, Hemorrhage, Ambush, or Ghostly Strike. Lasts [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Malice
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your meele and ranged critical strike chance by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Ruthlessness
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives your Rogue melee finishing moves a [@value]% chance to add a combo point to your target.

TalentsTiers.Name: Blood Spatter
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage caused by your Garrote and Rupture abilities by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Puncturing Wounds
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Backstab ability by [@value]%, and the critical strike chance of your Mutilate ability by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Vigor
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your maximum Energy by 10.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Expose Armor
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the energy cost of your Expose Armor ability by [@value].

TalentsTiers.Name: Lethality
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of all combo point-generating Rogue abilities that do not require stealth by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Vile Poisons
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage dealt by your poisons and Envenom ability by [@value]% and gives your poisons an additional [@value2]% chance to resist dispel effects.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Poisons
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the chance to apply Deadly Poison to your target by [@value]% and the frequency of applying Instant Poison to your target by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Fleet Footed
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the duration of all movement impairing effects by [@value]% and increases your movement speed by [@value2]%. This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.

TalentsTiers.Name: Cold Blood
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant
3 min cooldown

When activated, increases the critical strike chance of your next offensive ability by 100%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Kidney Shot
TalentsTiers.Description: While affected by your Kidney Shot ability, the target receives an additional [@value]% damage from all sources.

TalentsTiers.Name: Quick Recovery
TalentsTiers.Description: All healing effects on you are increased by [@value]%. This effect does not stack with other similar effects. In addition, your finishing moves cost [@value2]% less Energy when they fail to hit.

TalentsTiers.Name: Seal Fate
TalentsTiers.Description: Your critical strikes from Rogue abilities that add combo points have a [@value]% chance to add an additional combo point.

TalentsTiers.Name: Murder
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases all physical and nature damage caused by [@value]%

TalentsTiers.Name: Deadly Brew
TalentsTiers.Description: When you apply Instant, Wound or Mind-Numbing poison to a target, you have a [@value]% chance to apply Crippling poison.

TalentsTiers.Name: Overkill
TalentsTiers.Description: While stealthed and for 20 seconds after breaking stealth, you regenerate 30% additional energy.

TalentsTiers.Name: Deadened Nerves
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces all damage taken by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Focused Attacks
TalentsTiers.Description: Your melee critical strikes have a [@value]% chance to give you [@value2] energy.

TalentsTiers.Name: Find Weakness
TalentsTiers.Description: Offensive ability damage increased by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Master Poisoner
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical chance of all attacks made against any target you have poisoned by [@value]% and reduces the duration of all Poison effects applied to you by [@value2]%. and gives Envenom a [@value3]% chance to not consume Deadly Poison.

TalentsTiers.Name: Mutilate
TalentsTiers.Description:
60 Energy
Melee Range

Instant
Requires Daggers
Instantly attacks with both weapons for 100% weapon damage plus an additional 44 with each weapon. Damage is increased by 30% against Poisoned targets. Awards 2 combo points.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Turn the Tables
TalentsTiers.Description: Whenever anyone in your party or raid blocks, dodges, or parries an attack your chance to critically hit with all combo moves is increased by [@value]% for [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Cut to the Chase
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Eviscerate and Envenom abilities have a [@value]% chance to refresh your Slice and Dice duration to its [@value2] combo point maximum.

TalentsTiers.Name: Hunger For Blood
TalentsTiers.Description:
15 Energy
30 yds

Instant
Enrages you, increasing all damage caused by 5%. Requires a bleed effect to be active on the target. Lasts 1 min.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
